help.title: Help center
help.lead: Find quick answers to the most common questions and the right channels to contact support. We keep this page updated with recommended procedures, documentation links, and emergency contacts.

resources.title: Essential documentation
resources.description: Complete guides to get started and dive into the most-used modules.

onboarding.label: Backoffice onboarding guide
onboarding.description: Initial setup, branding, and permissions in under 30 minutes.

bookings.label: Complete bookings workflow
bookings.description: From quoting to financial reconciliation with alerts and automations.

housekeeping.label: Digital housekeeping checklist
housekeeping.description: Best practices to organise tasks, photos, and audits.

resetPassword.question: How do I reset a colleague's password?
resetPassword.answer: Go to Administration › Users, select the account, and use the "Change password" form.

monthlyReports.question: Where can I find the monthly reports?
monthlyReports.answer: Visit Finance › Financial overview for monthly charts and exports.

shareCalendar.question: How do I share the calendar with reception?
shareCalendar.answer: Grant the appropriate scope in "Update privileges" and share the direct calendar link (/calendar).

channels.title: Support contacts
channels.description: Choose the channel that best matches the urgency and the team involved.

email.label: Support email
email.description: Average response time under 4 business hours.

phone.label: Phone line
phone.description: Available on business days from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m.

emergencyChat.label: Emergency chat
emergencyChat.value: Speech bubble icon in the bottom-right corner
emergencyChat.description: Priority resolution for channel outages or critical failures.

tips.contextDetails: Include booking ID, property, and steps already taken when opening a ticket.
tips.evidence: Collect screenshots and timestamps to speed up technical analysis.
tips.escalateCritical: Escalate critical incidents as soon as they affect guests or external partners.

uxApi.title: UX API & integrations
uxApi.lead: Build secure automations on top of the backoffice services: bulk update rates, synchronise blocks, and export reports without manual work. Explore the official documentation or follow the getting started tutorial to connect your system.

rates.title: Rate management
rates.description: Bulk update prices via the PUT /admin/api/rates/bulk endpoint with validation and instant undo.

blocks.title: Unit blocks
blocks.description: Create availability blocks synced with OTAs using POST /admin/api/units/:id/blocks.

reviews.title: Review management
reviews.description: Fetch and reply to negative reviews via /admin/api/reviews with full telemetry.

reports.title: Reports & exports
reports.description: Generate weekly snapshots in JSON, CSV, or PDF with GET /admin/api/reports/weekly.

tokens.title: Access tokens
tokens.description: Each token identifies external integrations and limits what they can read or change. Use distinct keys per environment and rotate them regularly to meet security policies.

table.empty: No active tokens for this tenant.

tokens.footnote: Keep track of who created each token. If compromised, revoke it and create a new key to reduce impact.

format.title: Key format
format.description: Use 40-character hexadecimal tokens and store them in secret vaults.
format.tooltip: Example: 9f4b12c0a9c3… Only lowercase letters and numbers are accepted.

scopes.title: Minimal scopes
scopes.description: Grant only the scopes each integration needs, such as reservations:read or housekeeping:manage.
scopes.tooltip: Combine scopes to create tailored profiles per integration.

lifecycle.title: Lifecycle
lifecycle.description: Rotate credentials every 90 days and revoke them immediately when switching providers.
lifecycle.tooltip: Revoked tokens stop working right away.

integrations.description: Integrate and sync data with the {name} connector.
